Henry Linsberg

  1. Foster Name: Henry
  2. Foster Family: Norm and Tracey Mead
  3. Location of Family: Stella, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Wymore, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 3
  7. Date of Birth: 1883
  8. Gender: male
  9. Source: "Riders of the Orphan Trains: Nebraska," http://www.usgennet.org/usa/ne/topic/trains/riders.htm; GenForum search for Henry Mead.
